description: Try our easy to follow White Chocolate & Coconut Fondue recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: White Chocolate & Coconut Fondue Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop good-quality white chocolate. Place it into a medium heavy-based saucepan, along with whipping cream and coconut-flavored liqueur.
Heat the mixture slowly over a medium heat, stirring constantly, until the chocolate has melted and the mixture is smooth, glossy and warm.
Transfer to a fondue set to keep warm, or serve immediately in a bowl with the dippers alongside.
